phrs.translation: 酒徒, 的中文释义, 醉汉

sentences.sentence: I want to know why the press focus their bile on Mourinho and Chelsea and let this arrogant condescending tosspot get away with risking the future of our national game - no questions asked?
sentences.translation: 我想知道，为什么大众都把怒气撒到穆里尼奥和切尔西身上，而任由那个傲慢虚伪的疯子拿英国足球的未来耍着玩——而无人问津？
